summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience (2010-2014) in the development, support and enhancement of web and Windows applications using ASP.NET, C#, PL/SQL and SQL Server/Oracle. Experienced with Business Objects XI 3.1, data analysis, application hosting, and ITIL-aligned processes. Proficient in web-based tools development, SOW/SLA tracking, and cloud familiarity (Azure). Strong debugging, problem-solving, and customer-focused delivery.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Development, support and enhancement of web and Windows applications; designed and developed web-based tools in ASP.NET 3.5 using C# and PL/SQL; enhanced E-Business applications; analyzed codes and provided solutions using SQL and Business Objects XI 3.1; awarded for outstanding performance and on-time delivery; knowledge in Windows Presentation Foundation and AngularJS; basic understanding of moving applications to Microsoft Azure.

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Led development of SOW Tracker and SLA Tracker web-based tools; collaborated with IT vendors and LBG; hosted applications in IIS 7.0; used ASP.NET 3.5, C#, PL/SQL, HTML, AJAX, CSS; used SQL Server, Visual Studio and Visual SourceSafe; created data capture, reporting and integration features; contributed to project delivery and documentation.

certifications: ITIL ASM Basic (RTB Business Academy) Oct 2011
Windows and Web Application Development using .Net Framework (NIIT Ltd) Jan 2010
